src_text: 今天是新年初九，我们将向玉皇大帝祈福。

translations.translation_1: Today is the beginning of the new year, and we will be blessing the emperor.
translations.translation_2: Today is the ninth day of the New Year, and we will pray to the Jade Emperor.
translations.translation_3: Today is the ninth day of the Lunar New Year, and we will pray to the Jade Emperor.

translations.translation_1: Kids are playing in the garden
translations.translation_2: Children are playing in the park
translations.translation_3: Kids are playing in the park
